EmailTemplate.description: Send it to approvers for new Licence
EmailTemplate.name: PartnerInfo New Licence Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval required to assign new Licence {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please approve new Licence {!Account.Name}.
To approve or reject this item, click this link {!Workitem.ID}
Or reply to this email with one of these words in the first line of the email message: APPROVE, APPROVED, YES, REJECT, REJECTED, NO
regards,
